artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Takenouchi Magohachi
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 246, horizontal ōban #28.2
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Poem: Ishiyama ya/ nio no umi teru/ tsukikage wa/ Akashi mo Suma mo/ hoka naranu ka wa
石山や　にほのうみてる　月かげは　明石もすまも　外ならぬかわ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Eight Views of Ōmi (Ōmi hakkei no uchi 近江八景之内)
title: Autumn Moon at Ishiyama Temple
